import React, { useState } from "react"; import { submitHandlr } from "./handlrs"; import { Input } from "../UI/Input"; import { Button } from "../UI/Button"; export const AuthForm = props => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); return (
submitHandlr(e, isLogin)}> {!isLogin && }
{!isLogin ? 'Already have an account?': 'Need to create a new account?'}
) };
